verses.name: Ezekiel 32:3
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord God; I will therefore spread out my net over thee with a company of many people; and they shall bring thee up in my net.

verses.name: Ezekiel 32:4
verses.text: Then will I leave thee upon the land, I will cast thee forth upon the open field, and will cause all the fowls of the heaven to remain upon thee, and I will fill the beasts of the whole earth with thee.

verses.name: Ezekiel 32:5
verses.text: And I will lay thy flesh upon the mountains, and fill the valleys with thy height.
